title: "Built-up area" means the area covered by a building on all floors including cantilevered portion, if any, but excluding cladding and areas specifically exempted under these Regulations for the purpose of computation of FSI
clause_text: "Built-up area" means the area covered by a building on all floors including cantilevered portion, if any, but excluding cladding and areas specifically exempted under these Regulations for the purpose of computation of FSI. "Cabin" means a non-residential enclosure constructed of non-load bearing partitions. “Canopy” means a cantilevered projection over any building entrance.
